Package com.example.questplugin.Listeners

Class BlockEventsListener

java.lang.Object
com.example.questplugin.Listeners.BaseListener
com.example.questplugin.Listeners.BlockEventsListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class BlockEventsListener extends BaseListener implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
A listener that handles block-related events such as BlockBreakEvent and BlockPlaceEvent, updating players' quest progress accordingly.

  • Field Summary

    Handles the BlockBreakEvent by logging the event and updating players' quest progress for mining blocks.
